content: S-MD 12-14 HWH #3 SS304 Self-drilling screws Self-drilling screw (A2 stainless steel) with 5/16 washer for thin-medium metal-to-metal fastenings (up to 0.16 inch) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Self-drilling screw for fast assembly in one step Creates more reliable, corrosion-resistant fastenings EPDM rubber washer â€“ creates a more reliable seal against water Fast and robust drill tip For more reliable fastenings with defined load values Applications Fastening sheet metal and profiles to steel substructures and framing, with or without intermediate insulation layers Stainless steel (A2) for fastening in mildly corrosive environments Thin metal-to-metal connections (up to 0.16 inch) Fastening trapezoidal metal sheets to liner trays ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw drive/recess type: Hexagon 8 Base materials: Aluminium, Carbon steel Environmental Conditions: Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution, Outdoor with moderate concentration of pollution Technical Data | Screw drive/recess type | Hexagon 8 | Base materials | Aluminium, Carbon steel | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution, Outdoor with moderate concentration of pollution | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2322185 - Screw S-MD 12-14 x 2 HWH #3 SS304 - Package Size 250 pc - 2322186 - Screw S-MD 12-14 x 2 1/2 HWH #3 SS304 - Package Size 100 pc
